title: Lepai LP-2020A+ Tripath Class-T Mini Audio Amplifier with Power Supply Black
description: Note:This listing is US shipping and buyer can receive the item in 2-5 days.Buy the latest version of Lepai Ta2020 from Local. Better Buying Experience!! Promise Higher Quality.Features:1.Built-in loudspeaker protection circuit triggers when the amplifier is turned on to protect speakers from high volume bursts of audio.2.Over-voltage protection circuit shuts down amplifier should input voltage exceed 14.4V DC.3.Mini size easy to installation by DIY without manual, especially good fit for car, motorcycle ,bike,boat, every where!4.Support AUX stereo audio Input ,Can be plug in with CD,DVD,PC,MP3/MP4,digital music player.Package Included:1 x LP-2020A+ Amplifier Black1 x Power adapter US plug
